attributes.action: Award a knighthood to Andy Murray
attributes.background: Andy Murray is Great Britain's best ever sportsman. His dedication to tennis has been rewarded by a string of victories. He guided team GB to the Davis Cup and has won Wimbledon twice. He holds two olympic gold medals and has recently become world number one. He truly is a great UK ambassador.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
